name: Motkonqe
description:
Motkonqe is a real-time strategy game a little similar to the classic Populous game.

Your object is to lead the blue people and beat the red people.
You can make the ground and direct your people where to go.

Controls

Arrow keys         : Move
Space,[Z],A-Button : Edit the ground / Use the item
[X],B-Button       : Set the target
[H],B-Button+Down  : Build the house

Command items
When the people pick up command items, you can store them. You can use them arbitrarily.
House ... builds a house.
Swamp ...Creates a swamp.

- Other items
When the people pick up the other items, the effect will be applied immediately.
Shield ...  Becomes a knight
Fruit ... Increases the strength
Jewel ... Score
